name: bnomei/kirby3-srcset
description: Kirby 3 Plugin for creating image srcset using picture element

scripts.zip: rm kirby3-srcset.zip; composer remove getkirby/cms; composer dumpautoload -o; composer archive --format=zip --file=kirby3-srcset; composer require getkirby/cms:'dev-master as 3.0.0'; composer dumpautoload -o;
